data.name: Moon Breakers:  Flyboy Bundle DLC
data.detailed_description:
I see you’re looking at the Piranha, she’s quite a ship. You’ve got a bunch of machine guns, tracking missiles and some serious shielding, Mister. No previous owners. You think you’re ready for something like her? Sure you are... and to sweeten the deal we’ll throw in an x4 Boost. That’s going to put a lot of Cred in your pocket with every kill, my friend, and there WILL be kills when you’re behind the controls of this beauty. We won’t be offering this for long, so step in my office and let’s get you flying.

Save over 10% on this bundle when compared to purchasing the individual items in game!

Flyboy Bundle Includes

  • FH-200 Piranha
  • x4 25 Game Boost

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Operating System: Windows XP or better
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Hard Disk Space: 512 MB
  • Video: OpenGL 2.0 with 128 MB of Video RAM
  • Sound: Stereo Audio Output
  • DirectX®: dx50
  • Additional:Permanent Internet connection required

data.legal_notice: Moon Breakers Copyright 2012, Imba Entertainment Inc. Audio Engine: FMOD Sound System by Firelight Technologies.
